reviews.review: it was amazing and greatest game i have ever played.

Portal 2 on hyvin hauska pelata varsinkin kaverin kanssa koska Portal 1 ei voinut pelata yhdessä kaverin kanssa ja tässä voi! Eniten pidän pelaajien tekemistä kentistä ja on kivaa myös itse tehdä kenttiä. Jotkut pelaajien t tekemät kentät on jopa parempia kuin itse Valven tekemät. Lisäksi story mode oli ihana rakastin juonenkäänteitä ja pitkää tarinaa. Tarina ei ollut liian pitkä eikä liian lyhytkään.
第一次玩很惊艳，重温就没那个味儿了，解开谜题的成就感很上头

Portal 2 je logická FPS hra, kde máte jeden a prostý úkol. Dostat se z bodu A do bodu B, pomocí zbraní, která střílí Portály.
Portal je opravdu jedna z nejlepších her tady na steamu a asi nejlepší hra od Valve. Hra neomrzí hned, máte si možnost zahrát "nekonečně" mnoho levelů a ostatních věci. Hra nabízí i kooperativní mód. Plus při vašem hraní na vás hází GLaDOS (takový protivník) jednu urážku a hned další urážku. Další plus jsou také České titulky. To je asi vše důležitého co jsem chtěl říct. Hru určitě kupte, o nic nepříjdete. Klidně i za plnou cenu (8,19 eur). 

9,9/10
Залетел в дырку, но не портала
Very complicated puzzles at many sections. Helps 2 train the brain to be Albert Einstein
All i can say is i don't regret the purchase :)

As I said in my review for Portal, I will forever love the two games, it's incredible for me to play, even after all these years.

Required reading for any gamer, and honestly, anyone who owns a PC that's newer than ~10 years old. There's no reason not to play it, this game appeals to everyone at some level, and you may even start playing more games because of it. Absolute must for anyone.
I loved the game fun,brain teasing,and of course some of the best characters ever written.

When I first saw this game I KNEW I had to play it. I bought it just before it came to Linux, so I had tons of technical problems, but I worked through it to be able to play this (Yes, this is one of THOSE games). I even downloaded and installed steam for this very game. I was slightly disappointed that there wasn't as much of a story to it as I thought, and the logic of the ending is, well, questionable, but it's still a great game.

When I first got it I remember thinking that I'd always be able to play it because of the workshop content, but after a while you get kind of tired of the gameplay mechanics. It's still worth the price but it's fun won't last forever.
For an 11 year old game this is awesome.
one of the best gaming experiences I have ever had, you should get it if you want to have a game to complete and if you want to have fun in the gaming world. 10/10

My First game on Steam and my first game on PC, I remember loving it when I was younger and even now replaying it, it is still great. Even the Multiplayer is a fun addition if you haven't had enough with the Portal SIngleplayer Story. If you play Co-Op with a friend or a stranger I think it is always fun to try and solve these puzzles together.
It has great humor a great story and the puzzles are interesting and not too easy and not too hard to solve.
A game that has made a dent in gaming culture. It is and will always be one of my absolute favourite games and I'm sure I'll always come back to play it again.

Мне понравился Portal 2. Я хоть и не играл в первую часть, но могу сказать, что игра достаточно хорошая головоломка с множеством механик, кайфным мувментом и сюжетом. Лично мне, такие как эта игра быстро надоедают, но Portal 2 меня задержала надолго и когда нибудь я выполню все достижения. Сама идея портальной пушки мне понравилась, я вообще очень люблю всякие портальные технологии и всё такое. Короче, игра стоит своих денег
